name: PIG and CREEPER
description:
Once upon a time there was a pig and a creeper. They're very close friends. Whatever happened one day they had a fight and found themselves in the magic arena.

PIG and CREEPER is a fun action game for 2 players. Play with your friends in this fun minecraft universe

HOW TO PLAY:

1 Player Control:

WASD: Movement                                          

2 Player Control:

Arrow Keys: Movement
